languages.text: "Нравится? Я приказал создать этот яд специально для тебя! Кто бы мог подумать, что однажды мон-кай удостоится подобной чести — получить особенный подарок от самого дракона? Но твои страдания..." {n}Ксенос наклоняется ближе.{/n} "Я знал, что с небольшим вкладом друкарского таланта по извлечению мук их вкус получится особенным..."

traits.locale_text: "Нравится? Я приказал создать этот яд специально для тебя! Кто бы мог подумать, что однажды мон-кай удостоится подобной чести — получить особенный подарок от самого дракона? Но твои страдания... " {n}Ксенос наклоняется ближе.{/n} "Я знал, что с небольшым вкладом друкарского таланта по извлечению мук их вкус получится особенным..."
traits.speaker: YrlietAbductionMarazhai

languages.text: "Are you enjoying the sensation? I had this poison made for you! Who could have thought that a mon-keigh would one day earn such an honour: a special gift from a Dracon? But your suffering..." {n}The xenos leans closer to you.{/n} "I knew the taste would be exquisite were I to add a touch of the Drukhari's talent for extracting anguish..."

Но твои страдания..." {n}Ксенос наклоняется ближе.{/n} "Я знал, что с небольшим вкладом друкарского таланта по извлечению мук их вкус получится особенным..."

traits.locale_text: "Are you enjoying the sensation? I had this poison made for you! Who could have thought that a mon-keigh would one day earn such an honour: a special gift from a Dracon? But your suffering..." {n}The xenos leans closer to you.{/n} "I knew the taste would be exquisite were I to add a touch of the Drukhari's talent for extracting anguish..."
traits.speaker: YrlietAbductionMarazhai

languages.text: « Est-ce que cette sensation vous plaît ? J'ai fait préparer ce poison rien que pour vous ! Qui aurait pu penser qu'un jour, un mon-keigh recevrait un cadeau spécial de la part d'un dracon ? Quel insigne honneur ! Mais votre souffrance... » {n}Le xénos se rapproche de vous.{/n} « Je savais que le goût serait exquis en y ajoutant un soupçon du talent des Drukharis pour extraire l'angoisse... »
languages.original_text: "Are you enjoying the sensation? I had this poison made for you! Who could have thought that a mon-keigh would one day earn such an honour: a special gift from a Dracon? But your suffering..." {n}The xenos leans closer to you.{/n} "I knew the taste would be exquisite were I to add a touch of the Drukhari's talent for extracting anguish..."

traits.locale_text: « Est-ce que cette sensation vous plaît ? J'ai fait préparer ce poison rien que pour vous ! Qui aurait pu penser qu'un jour, un mon-keigh recevrait un cadeau spécial de la part d'un dracon ? Quel insigne honneur ! Mais votre souffrance... » {n}Le xénos se rapproche de vous.{/n} « Je savais que le goût serait exquis en y ajoutant un soupçon du talent des Drukharis pour extraire l'angoisse... »
traits.speaker: YrlietAbductionMarazhai

languages.text: “你喜欢这种感觉吗？我可是让人特地为你调配了这样的毒药！谁能想到，你这只猴子居然能配得上这样的荣耀呢？这可是裁决官给你的特别礼物。不过，你的痛苦……”{n}玛拉斋朝你靠了过来。{/n}“我早就知道，只要善加利用我们提取痛苦方面的天赋，你的痛苦品尝起来一定会非常精致……”
languages.original_text: "Are you enjoying the sensation? I had this poison made for you! Who could have thought that a mon-keigh would one day earn such an honour: a special gift from a Dracon? But your suffering..." {n}The xenos leans closer to you.{/n} "I knew the taste would be exquisite were I to add a touch of the Drukhari's talent for extracting anguish..."

traits.locale_text: “你喜欢这种感觉吗？我可是让人特地为你调配了这样的毒药！谁能想到，你这只猴子居然能配得上这样的荣耀呢？这可是裁决官给你的特别礼物。不过，你的痛苦……”{n}玛拉斋朝你靠了过来。{/n}“我早就知道，只要善加利用我们提取痛苦方面的天赋，你的痛苦品尝起来一定会非常精致……”
traits.speaker: YrlietAbductionMarazhai

languages.text: 「毒に蝕まれる感覚はどうかな？この毒はお前のために作ったんだ！ドラコンから特別な贈り物を与えられるという栄誉を、モン＝ケイが授かる日が来るとは誰が想像できただろうな？だがお前の苦しみは…」{n}異種族はあなたに近づいた。{/n}「苦痛を抽出するというデュカーリの才能をもってすれば格別な味わいになるとわかっていたぞ…」
languages.original_text: "Are you enjoying the sensation? I had this poison made for you! Who could have thought that a mon-keigh would one day earn such an honour: a special gift from a Dracon? But your suffering..." {n}The xenos leans closer to you.{/n} "I knew the taste would be exquisite were I to add a touch of the Drukhari's talent for extracting anguish..."

traits.locale_text: 「毒に蝕まれる感覚はどうかな？この毒はお前のために作ったんだ！ドラコンから特別な贈り物を与えられるという栄誉を、モン＝ケイが授かる日が来るとは誰が想像できただろうな？だがお前の苦しみは…」{n}異種族はあなたに近づいた。{/n}「苦痛を抽出するというデュカーリの才能をもってすれば格別な味わいになるとわかっていたぞ…」
traits.speaker: YrlietAbductionMarazhai

languages.text: "Wie gefällt Euch das Gefühl? Ich habe das Gift nur für Euch gemacht! Wer hätte schon gedacht, dass {mf|einem|einer} Chem-Pan-Sey eines Tages eine solche Ehre ereilen würde – ein besonderes Geschenk von einem Dracon? Aber Euer Leiden ..." {n}Der Xenos beugt sich näher zu dir.{/n} "Ich war mir sicher, dass ich einen ganz exquisiten Geschmack erzeugen könnte, wenn ich nur einen Hauch des Talents der Drukhari mit einfließen lassen würde – wir kennen uns mit Qualen aus ..."
languages.original_text: "Are you enjoying the sensation? I had this poison made for you! Who could have thought that a mon-keigh would one day earn such an honour: a special gift from a Dracon? But your suffering..." {n}The xenos leans closer to you.{/n} "I knew the taste would be exquisite were I to add a touch of the Drukhari's talent for extracting anguish..."

traits.locale_text: "Wie gefällt Euch das Gefühl? Ich habe das Gift nur für Euch gemacht! Wer hätte schon gedacht, dass {mf|einem|einer} Chem-Pan-Sey eines Tages eine solche Ehre ereilen würde – ein besonderes Geschenk von einem Dracon? Aber Euer Leiden ..." {n}Der Xenos beugt sich näher zu dir.{/n} "Ich war mir sicher, dass ich einen ganz exquisiten Geschmack erzeugen könnte, wenn ich nur einen Hauch des Talents der Drukhari mit einfließen lassen würde – wir kennen uns mit Qualen aus ..."
traits.speaker: YrlietAbductionMarazhai

languages.text: «¿Disfrutas de la sensación? ¡He diseñado este veneno especialmente para ti! ¿Quién habría podido imaginar que {mf|un|una} mon-keigh llegaría a merecer tal honor: un obsequio especial de un dracón? Ah, pero tu sufrimiento...». {n}El xenos se inclina hacia ti.{/n} «Presentía que su sabor sería exquisito si añadía un toque del talento Drukhari para la mortificación...».
languages.original_text: "Are you enjoying the sensation? I had this poison made for you! Who could have thought that a mon-keigh would one day earn such an honour: a special gift from a Dracon? But your suffering..." {n}The xenos leans closer to you.{/n} "I knew the taste would be exquisite were I to add a touch of the Drukhari's talent for extracting anguish..."

traits.locale_text: «¿Disfrutas de la sensación? ¡He diseñado este veneno especialmente para ti! ¿Quién habría podido imaginar que {mf|un|una} mon-keigh llegaría a merecer tal honor: un obsequio especial de un dracón? Ah, pero tu sufrimiento...». {n}El xenos se inclina hacia ti.{/n} «Presentía que su sabor sería exquisito si añadía un toque del talento Drukhari para la mortificación...».
traits.speaker: YrlietAbductionMarazhai

languages.text: "Nasıl, güzel hissettiriyor mu? Bu zehri sana özel hazırlattım! Kim derdi ki gün gelecek, bir Drakon kalkıp da mon-keighlere özel bir hediye hazırlayacak? Ne büyük şeref! Çektiğin ızdıraba gelecek olursak..." {n}Zeno sana doğru eğiliyor.{/n} "Drukharilere özgü eziyet etme hünerlerini biraz konuşturunca çekeceğin ızdırabın zevkinin muhteşem olacağını biliyordum..."
languages.original_text: "Are you enjoying the sensation? I had this poison made for you! Who could have thought that a mon-keigh would one day earn such an honour: a special gift from a Dracon? But your suffering..." {n}The xenos leans closer to you.{/n} "I knew the taste would be exquisite were I to add a touch of the Drukhari's talent for extracting anguish..."

traits.locale_text: "Nasıl, güzel hissettiriyor mu? Bu zehri sana özel hazırlattım! Kim derdi ki gün gelecek, bir bir Drakon kalkıp da mon-keighlere özel bir hediye hazırlayacak? Ne büyük bir şeref! Çektiğin ızdıraba gelecek olursak..." {n}Zeno sana doğru eğiliyor.{/n} "Drukharilere özgü eziyet etme hünerlerini biraz konuşturunca, çekeceğin ızdırabın zevkinin muhteşem olacağını biliyordum..."
traits.speaker: YrlietAbductionMarazhai
